title: UN Calls For Immediate Access To Conflict-Affected Areas To Prevent Catastrophe In South Sudan (UNICEF ...
text: ( Source : UNICEF UK ) 3.9 million people now face severe hunger; tens of thousands on brink of famine 22 October 2015 - Three UN agencies today warned that extreme hunger is pushing people to the brink of a catastrophe in parts of South
